model: Stratos Cordless with Clean Sense IQ (IZ862H)
seo_keywords: Shark Stratos cordless brush not spinning

problems.title: Clean Sense IQ Revving / Erratic
problems.description: Motor speeds up and slows down randomly even on clean floors.
possible_causes: Sensors in the nozzle are dirty
solution_steps: Wipe the infrared sensors inside the floor nozzle entry.
Check for hair wrapped around the brush roll.

problems.title: Brush Roll Not Spinning
problems.description: Floor nozzle lights are off or flashing red.
solution_steps: Clean the metal pins on the wand hinge.
Connect the handheld unit directly to the nozzle to test if the wand is broken.
